website_summaries.verdict: It has some nice qualities, including its style. But it also has some flaws; construction could be better.
pros: Modern mocha look complements most bedrooms
cons: Some owners comment that the finish is easily scratched
The legs feel a bit flimsy, though the stand is on the heavy side

customer_reviews.title: Nice Piece
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter to use at college. Easy installation. She and I spent no more than 30 minutes putting it together (you'll need a hammer and a Phillips screwdriver). Box was very well protected with extra cardboard on each end of the main packaging box and there were no damages to the nightstand pieces. Looks good in the room and the dark color makes it more elegant. We also purchased the matching dresser () and was unfortunately not as happy with how it came from the factory since the damages on that one would have never come from transport. Overall, not a bad price for what you get even for fancy particle board.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bedside tables!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these bedside tables to update my guestroom before company comes for the holidays. They are heavy solid pieces, easy for one person to put together with us Phillips screwdriver and a hammer. Packaging was great with no damage and complete hardware and instructions. Instructions were easy to follow with Humorous tips to keep a smile on your Face while you were building them. I’m waiting for a matching bureau and I’m so excited that these pieces will give my guestroom the update it really needed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They look great
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these to have matching night stands. Assembly was a bit involved but overall easy and honestly, these things look great! I thought there would be an issue since they are particle board, but they look awesome and really, how much wear and tear do nightstands get? Not much. When installing the cardboard piece on the back, don't be a ding-dong like me, look closely. There is a front and back to it. The finished part will be visible through the large opening on the bottom of the nightstand.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Best nightstand for a apartment
customer_reviews.text: I went to Ikea and was disappointed how cheaply made their nightstands were, but also because they were also over priced. I bought one night stand to see how it was since there's a lot of mixed reviews. I am so happy that I decided to buy this night stand. It's pretty easy to build you just have read it carefully and not rush. I loved it so much that I bought another one. The second night stand literally only took me 30 mins to assemble. Nothing came broken or cracked. The packinging was a little beat up, but that was it.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Night stand
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, this is obviously not real wood but, it was easy to assemble and it looks really good in our bedroom. I love the color, and the picture makes it looks smaller than what it really is in size. I love the size and how I can fit more than just a lamp on the table. This was a great purchase for me!
customer_reviews.author: HAILEY

customer_reviews.title: Love these nightstands!
customer_reviews.text: The pieces in the box were tight together but not separated to prevent from scratching one another. We were able to hide some scratches with using them upside-down. At the end we baught a wood pen to color the remaining scratches from the front. Now I love my nightstands
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Description off
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why they call it a child night stand. This is normal size. Same as the regular one advertised elsewhere on Amazon, but for some reason at a lower price. What ever the reason I'll take it! Great quality and only took about a half hour to assemble. Came packed very well and arrived without damage. Don't be put off by the child description. Can be used in any bedroom!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Complete garbage. IT went together easily and looked very nice but it has been less than 4 months and it is bowed over 2 inches down in middle. Nothing heavy has been placed in the drawers or on top only some clothing not even 1/4 the capacity. The dresser has a extra leg in back center that makes me think the company knows it is a problem but it doesn't solve it. I had to purchase a leg from lowes and place it on front center to bring the middle backbup. The drawers are now scared from rubbing and bumping into each other where the who tging was leaning. Would not wast money on this product.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a little while ago as a set, and it is wonderful (as long as you don't mind putting it together). It looks perfect in our bedroom. My only complaint would be that when it came, some of the pieces of 'wood' were scratched, or some of the vinyl had been peeled away as if it had been dropped or smashed into something. All in all a good piece!
customer_reviews.author: Gaby Stout

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Especially for the price, I couldn't recommend this nightstand more. Well, I could. I followed the instructions to a T, but the drawer refuses to fit. It gets stuck opening and closing every time. It still works, but after putting in a solid 2 hours, it left a bad taste in my mouth. So close to perfect! Yet so far. Otherwise, this is a gorgeous and sturdy nightstand and well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Consummate Consumer

customer_reviews.title: It's a pretty solid piece of furniture for not being real wood
customer_reviews.text: It's a cute night stand but the holes for the top were drilled backward. So the front that is supposed to have a lip over the edge is flush with the legs and drawer and the lip is in the back. If all sides were finished this wouldn't have been a problem obviously. It's a pretty solid piece of furniture for not being real wood, just wish the holes were drilled properly. I'll be contacting the manufacturer for a replacement top and see how that goes. I'd be careful having anything that could scratch it near it thought, it's not a sturdy "sticker" type surface.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Mailhot

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: I needed a nightstand for my guest bedroom and this looked to be perfect for the price. It came well packaged and with all the parts. Assembly took a little longer than I would have liked. I thought the instructions could have been a little clearer thought the illustrations were helpful. It seems fairly sturdy and I like the fact it has a shelf as well as a drawer. It's a good piece for my needs and will have to see how it holds up over time, but I am glad I purchased this nightstand.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the color and the size
customer_reviews.text: I feel for furniture we should have a 60 days or 90 days return or exchange policy. I bought it for my baby nursery; I love the color and the size. We went through he'll to put it together. I was almost due for my baby delivery when we decided to put it together. some tools were missing, there were some scratch on the woods. When I realized that it was already to late to return it. So my brother had no choice but to glue some part of it and the drawer couldn't close all the way. Worst purchase ever
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid S

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price, easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: This product was easy to assemble, it took a little bit, about an hour for me to finish it. But I went kind of slow wanting to make sure I didn't screw anything up. I love the dark finish on this, it's a great piece of furniture for the price. The only negative was that the backing was a little flimsier than I expected. I think there was another review that said they bought thicker wood to put on the back, again not necessary but if you were concerned it'd be a good option. Didn't come damaged/chipped and works great once assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Ryleigh

customer_reviews.title: Nice night stands!
customer_reviews.text: I bought to matching night stands. Assembly was pretty straight forward the only con was that many of the parts were not labeled (one night stand had labeled parts the other one did not). Luckily my parts were not damaged in delivery this time. Other than that, the stand itself looks nice and the drawer slides very easily!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Smith

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this product anyone looking for affordable bedroom furniture.
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I are both very happy with this product. The color and quality are great for the price, and it looks great with the furniture we already have. The only complaint: there were A LOT of pieces to put together. This would not be much of an issue, except my husband had to put together two night stands and the dresser. He was one annoyed hubby by the time he was done.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: First off these look exactly like the photo and the drawer slides out very easily
customer_reviews.text: First off these look exactly like the photo and the drawer slides out very easily. For me, these took forever to put together. The steps are clear and it's not hard, just a lot of steps. Probably operator error but I like to think I'm relatively handy. They look exactly like the photo and definitely get the job done as a nightstand without paying hundreds of dollars. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Came damaged
customer_reviews.text: The top has a very noticeable crack in it fresh out the box. The box wasn’t damaged but yet was there when I opened it. Listened to my girlfriend and put it together to see if I could still tell it’s there. Still very noticeable Thought it wouldn’t be as noticeable. Sadly I can’t stop looking at it when I walk by it.
customer_reviews.author: Garfield J

customer_reviews.title: Parts Don't Fit Perfectly But Its OK
customer_reviews.text: This nightstand was quite easy to build, however the parts didn't fit as perfectly as I would have expected and hoped for. The bottom shelf has a gap between it and the side and the top doesn't fully secure to the stand itself. These issues won't be noticeable one its in its spot and being used, however if you're looking for everything to fit like pieces of a puzzle, you have the wrong nightstand. It is still nice and worth what you pay for it, but just understand it won't be perfect once assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Colette Clermont

customer_reviews.title: Slight Gap But Good Product - Happy
customer_reviews.text: There is a slight gap between the top of the drawer and the bottom-side of the table top. Not too big of a deal, maybe it's designed that way, just looks odd if you get eye level with it (which isn't normal). Shipping was fast - nothing damaged. It was easy to put together - second one going quicker than the first, naturally. Overall I'm happy. The look good.
customer_reviews.author: SpencerB

customer_reviews.title: Great nightstand maybe a tad smaller from size measurements
customer_reviews.text: Great nightstand maybe a tad smaller from size measurements , but I put it in my little girls room for a nightstand and it works just fine. You'll need to put some oil on the brackets where the drawer slides in and out the drawer sticks a little bit. Other than that good quality product .
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Whew! cute nightstands but tiring to assemble
customer_reviews.text: These are solid nightstands once assembled, though jeez, assembling them wasn't very fun. These come with fun instructions (little notes at the corners remind you to refresh your drink/snacks) but if you don't read very carefully, one mistake can set you back by a lot. Plan to spend about 45 mins on each of these.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Loving this nightstand. I bought it for my 4 year olds room and it's perfect for that. Assembly took about an hour and a half on my own but instructions were clear.
customer_reviews.author: K Smith

customer_reviews.title: Take a Pass
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. This shoddily finished piece of furniture is acceptable but little more. It is wholly constructed of particle board with a veneer which at the corners reveals it is not solid wood. It took just under 1 hour to assemble. The instructions are clear and fairly easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Van Gogh

customer_reviews.title: and the instructions on this item was relatively easy to follow
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this along with the matching dresser, and both came a little roughed up. There were a few places where the finish was scratched off in noticeable areas, and a couple of chips. I was able to put both of them together myself, and the instructions on this item was relatively easy to follow, though the drawer is a tight squeeze and catches a little when it's pulled out. This is the same with several of the drawers on the dresser as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jes

customer_reviews.title: Amazing deal
customer_reviews.text: I had got a set with no nightstands and have been trying to look for something that will match it not only did it but I loved the style and look for the price you can't beat it for some reason in the picture is it looked smaller than once it arrived, but it actually was a good thing if it perfectly but had more room on top for me to put my stuff and not look cluttered. I would really recommend buying these.
customer_reviews.author: Marie82

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these and my boyfriend put them both together in under an hour. Very well made and very sturdy. I love the way they look .
customer_reviews.author: BABS61

customer_reviews.title: these ended up working great! They're pretty sturdy and it wasn't too difficult ...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a couple of matching nightstands for my bedroom, these ended up working great! They're pretty sturdy and it wasn't too difficult to assemble. No scratches or dings when they came.
customer_reviews.author: LuckyLam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great! One piece arrived damaged, so I called Sauder and they were fantastic. I had a replacement piece within a few days free of charge. Building this was very easy, and the end product is great.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Awesome nightstands
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous to order these and have them come in cheap or flimsy but we just put both of our nightstands together and they look great! They’re solid and a good size for our bedroom. The only price of advice I would offer is the letter stickers in the legs, peel them off and restick them to the bottom so that it comes off nicely when it’s all put together.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Villecco

customer_reviews.title: This sawdust is better for lining a hamster cage with.
customer_reviews.text: I get this thing is manufactured wood, but this is easily the biggest piece of trash I've ever assembled. The face of the drawer pulls off..... Our toddler can build a Lego house with more structural integrity than this bunk furniture. It'll look nice, just don't sneeze too hard or it will fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Hanson

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: It’s okay. It came scratched. And the rails don’t spin so my son has a hard time opening the drawer without it falling out
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold together
customer_reviews.text: I gave 1 star for value because it holds together as long as I dont need to move. I'm moving next week, so buying glue to reinforce. I followed the directions, but the lid comes right off- even after locking in as instructed. Very disappointed .
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Very Cheap Looking
customer_reviews.text: This product is okay, I bought because the picture looked nice and it was a great price. However, in person they look extremely cheap. It's just a paper film that looks like wood over it. Not good quality at all. And it knicks really easily
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the money! Exactly what we wanted!!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly... exactly as described. Separate the parts EXCATLY as pictured. Very important. Then read the directions. Assembly was easy and it looks great. We bought to compliment other new furniture for our guest rooom. Looks and functions great. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: James S. Thomasson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect nightstand
customer_reviews.text: Perfect nightstand for my daughters room. It was easy to assemble and it looks great in her room.
customer_reviews.author: S. Matte

customer_reviews.title: Great looking but....
customer_reviews.text: It looks great, it was easy to put together, but the screws weren't holding very well and when I picked it up to move it, it fell apart, though all I did to make it stay together was wood glue, so it looks pretty good now.
customer_reviews.author: naomi

customer_reviews.title: Great night stand
customer_reviews.text: This is a classy night stand that I love. The size and height is perfect. I plan on buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: OscarGirl

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are a good value for the price and they matched my headboard and footboard perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon D.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and good quality
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why people complain about quality. These night stands are beautiful. I have the set and it's just as good quality as the stuff you buy from the furniture stir and pay 3 grand for. Its all about assembly. If you suck and putting things together then the furniture will seem cheap. Pay someone to put it together if you need to. It'll be worth it in the end!
customer_reviews.author: hevenly

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I love this unit! Took the time to organize all the materials before constructing and it really helped the job go smoothly. Once constructed, it is very sturdy and looks really nice! I don't like that the back is basically just a sheet of colored heavy duty cardboard, but no one will notice but me. For the price a great but!
customer_reviews.author: Tina B.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Was delivered on time and undamaged. The nightstand was easy to put together with step by step picture instructions. The stand is sturdy with a little weight to it so I know it'll last depending on care. It's dark and looks just like the picture. I'm actually ordering a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Layla

customer_reviews.title: Great product/fast shipping!
customer_reviews.text: Matched my set I had bought at Menards a long time ago. Great!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Nightstands
customer_reviews.text: These were just what I needed for the guest room. Relatively easy to assemble, just be sure to read carefully and look at the illustrations.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Price
customer_reviews.text: Gave these to my boyfriend for Christmas since he had barely any bedroom furniture. He absolutely loves them ! They do require a good bit of assembling but he’s a cabinet maker so it wasn’t too difficult for him lol. Great buy compared to the very much more expensive nightstands you get at furniture stores. King size bed pictured in his bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Vcr90

customer_reviews.title: End table/ night stand
customer_reviews.text: I used these as end tables in my living room, great height and sturdy. Building them wasn’t too bad either
customer_reviews.author: Shannon A

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Takes about 1 hour to assemble. The instructions are clear just take your time. I had no issues. The product came in on time undamaged. I'm happy with the quality. I purchased two nightstands and both were fine.
customer_reviews.author: seattlite

customer_reviews.title: Great little table
customer_reviews.text: Great little table. I ordered 2. Assembly instructions were fairly straight forward. One of the drawers is a little stiff - probably just need to lubricate it a bit. Otherwise, the are working out just fine.
customer_reviews.author: E. Long

customer_reviews.title: Pretty bad. Very small
customer_reviews.text: Pretty bad. Very small, cost was maybe 2.00 to make in china. Cardboard bottom drawer, know even has a cover pressed over it. They couldn't just make a solid knob? The paper covering won't last. Wish I would have went with my gut on this one. Problem is I bought a couple cabinets around the same price and they were great so I thought I would get close to the same on this one. Nope! I'd pass!
customer_reviews.author: NV

customer_reviews.title: Seems easy to assemble as you follow the guide but then collapses
customer_reviews.text: I followed every step on the guide and made sure they are all tight. The moment i lift it everything collapsed and its damaged now. I managed to hold things together but im sure it would collapse if i put anything heavy on it
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, fell apart
customer_reviews.text: My husband followed directions to the T and this dresser still wouldnt fit together right. The placement of the drawer was off so opening the drawer was difficult and top the night stand is very lose where it can come right off. Would not recommend. Cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: all around great stand
customer_reviews.text: very nice stand several parts to put together but was easy with the book that was provided
customer_reviews.author: George H Dehn

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This was very disappointing. The edges are not smooth...they're very sharp that its dangerous when you accidentally hit yourself with it. Its very hard to assemble and some parts are flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Kay G.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Super packaged I'd say!! Easy to assemble and looks darn good! Thank you for being budget efficient and stylish to match my walnut bedroom furniture!
customer_reviews.author: The B Family

customer_reviews.title: Great bedside table!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased two of these, along with the rest of the bedroom set (headboard and dresser). Being on a budget, this was priced just right. There were some reviews on issues with assembly, however we did not experience that and my husband assembled in about 30 minutes. Beautiful furniture at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: The best nightstand for the price. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: This nightstand is amazing for the price. It is heavy and very sturdy. Don't think twice about buying it. I would compare the heavy dutyness of it to some of the pieces I've purchased from Haverty's. You wont be disappointed. Just be patient when putting it together!!! You'll love it!
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit hard to put together. But I just took my time and did it. Was well worth the price and was the exact color I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply built and defective.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this piece of furniture. It is made out of particle boards, with a cheap laminate finish. It looks bad in person, in my opinion. And, as you can see from my photo, the one I got came defective out of the box. There is a large crack on the top surface, that I didn't see until the last step of assembly. Very disappointed in this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Diomedes88

customer_reviews.title: Nice little nightstand
customer_reviews.text: A little more difficult to assemble than we thought but not terrible.. loved the instructions they were pretty funny if you read them. Overall it'll be good for use as a nightstand !
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Gatehouse

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought the complete outfit. To soon for a review. I like it overall. Looks great.
customer_reviews.author: ronray267

customer_reviews.title: Nice looks
customer_reviews.text: I picked this dresser because it matched the desk I bought perfectly. It looks pretty and feels sturdy. My only complaint is that when assembling, the drawer orientation is not clearly explained in the instructions. It took me 3 tries to get the gliders on properly (hence the loss of a star).
customer_reviews.author: Sata Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Love these nightstands
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and very sturdy. Very happy with my purchase. I would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, good color but a bit damaged from the factory.  Order two items, one had damage.
customer_reviews.text: Product itself looks great, almost black color. It's nice sized, stable, good drawer guides. etc. Good value for the money. One the right side of one of the unit, there are two big dents. These came from the factor this way, this was not shipping damage. There are two dime size dents - maybe 1/8 inch deep each. The packaging was a box in a box - corners were still a bit rough but didn't cause any damage.
customer_reviews.author: KHall

customer_reviews.title: Works well for the price- fairly sturdy, directions are those typical "insert A into B ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well for the price- fairly sturdy, directions are those typical "insert A into B and B into C" with only pictures- so kind of a pain to put together for those of us who are not analytically minded.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth27932

customer_reviews.title: beautiful, functional, easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these. They are incredibly easy to assemble. They're elegant and sturdy. I don't worry about them tipping over or falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: Kathrine Reeder

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: These night stands are beautiful. A bit cumbersome to put together but worth it. Once I put the first one together the second was a cinch. The knob on one of the stands was defective but I was able to find a replacement at orchard supply hardware for less than $2.00.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Matchett

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these and they went together relatively easy. The instructions also had jokes throughout which was oddly enjoyable. The only reason these didn't get 5 stars is because the drawers drag a little bit.
customer_reviews.author: Gtgrier

customer_reviews.title: Perfect nightstand
customer_reviews.text: Perfect item, a little annoying to put together but it turned out just right.
customer_reviews.author: A&W Mavis

customer_reviews.title: Nice table for the price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for a spare bedroom in daughters apartment. Nice table for the price. I did bump the bottom of the table with my vacuum cleaner and a piece fell off. It bent so I couldn't just slide it back on so I had to use wood glue. Still, I don't regret purchasing it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: We are using this for our record player and it’s the perfect size
customer_reviews.author: Heather M

customer_reviews.title: Excellent night stands
customer_reviews.text: Bought two for our bedroom. The drawers are a bit tight but the whole piece looks great. Well worth the money and straightforward directions.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Washington

customer_reviews.title: Be very careful
customer_reviews.text: Directions hard to follow and pieces vs not well marked. Had to dissemble several times and reassemble because parts and directions were not clear
customer_reviews.author: Greg Wilson

customer_reviews.title: It won't be easy to tip over.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my baby granddaughter, it looks great in her room.
customer_reviews.author: Sonja Harris

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy nightstand
customer_reviews.text: This nightstand is very sturdy and was not difficult to assemble. I'm very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: LD74

customer_reviews.title: Nice , but not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time... really nice wood finish. The instructions were pretty simple. The only thing is that it's not a strong sturdy nightstand. It'll do for now. Let's see how it will last for my 16yr old son.
customer_reviews.author: MikeSam

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I like this, but I think the 4 drawer chest seems to be a little better quality. Arrived with one nick, but luckily it was in a spot that can't be seen once assembled. I think it took me about an hour/hour and a half to assemble alone. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was the best buy! Everything fit together perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This was the best buy! Everything fit together perfectly. Arrived in perfect condition. This is a heavy good quality piece of furniture. i will look for this brand when purchasing another piece of furniture online.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Takes some time to put together but ...
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Takes some time to put together but thats the catch. Looks great. Not furniture that will last a lifetime, but for apartment goers and the like its a really good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Bell

customer_reviews.title: Great night stand
customer_reviews.text: This night stand looks and works great. It was easy to put together and really has the modern look we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great night table
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the kids room. Took about 45 mins to put together. The instructions were excellent and the thing was packaged extremely well. There wasn't so much as a scratch on any piece. Everyone should know by now that this is pressed wood and is heavy and damages very easily. Sauder has obviously perfected the packaging process.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Worst night stand ever
customer_reviews.text: The drawer does not open and it is super cheap material and the directions are horrible. If I could have returned it I would.
customer_reviews.author: kellyj imenez

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality for the price. The espresso color matches my other 'real' wood bedroom furniture and it looks like a set! The construction is solid, looks very nice and drawers are not flimsy. I bought another one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sauder makes excellent home furniture at an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: 3rd one I bought from Sauder. Sauder makes excellent home furniture at an affordable price. Good quality and design.
customer_reviews.author: Ni Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble if two people can do it! Looks good and sturdy.. happy with the decision!
customer_reviews.author: Dee D.

customer_reviews.title: Worst nightstand ever
customer_reviews.text: Assembled in 30 mins picked it up to take it to room completely fell apart in 1 second wish there was a zero star rating
customer_reviews.author: Robert Macias

customer_reviews.title: Really nice!
customer_reviews.text: Nice for a small to medium living room! Really pretty love the one drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good nightstand
customer_reviews.text: These are super easy to put together! They look exactly as pictured. I wish the back of this nightstand would be a bit more stable.
customer_reviews.author: Goalie333

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: The color is very nice, sort of a merlot/dark brown. They are sturdy and worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Campaigne

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This night stand looks exactly like the picture. it is works great with the dresser we had before.
customer_reviews.author: FAITH F MALONEY

customer_reviews.title: Never bought a one night stand on the internet before..
customer_reviews.text: Turns out exactly what I was looking for! Easy to assemble in about 1/2 hr.. Ikea-like quality but a very modest and simple nightstand. The 'Jamocha' color matches my other dark colored furniture so it worked out great!
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Great at the price.
customer_reviews.text: For the price you don't expect to get much but in reality to get a sturdy filler nightstand until you feel like using hundreds. I would definitely value this in the 99-139.99 range, it works, it's functional and fills the space. I paid significantly less.
customer_reviews.author: MWMullens

customer_reviews.title: This is a great piece of furniture easy to assemble and very sturdy ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great piece of furniture easy to assemble and very sturdy drawer I bought 4 pieces ...dresser chest and two nite stands it is awesome
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Rose

customer_reviews.title: VERY NICE
customer_reviews.text: So worth it, I bought the set. Very beautiful Fast shipping Not damage to this item Easy to put together yourself(I did, and I 6months Prego,) Smoth, I think i'll buy one for my little girls room as well:) VERY HAPPY WITH THIS
customer_reviews.author: cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much junk, not worth what you pay.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I am finding all of Sauder's furniture so far to be of very low quality materials, often already scratched or damaged in some way. I would never recommend their products.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Love it !
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and in great shape. Easy to assemble - pay attention to directions, draw through me off - I had it visualized different than what the instructions said. Nice looking furniture without spending hundreds of dollars !
customer_reviews.author: vickie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews and really wanted to see the product for myself. My Son put it together and it took about and hour. It was pretty simple and I really, really love how it looks. I does not look like your typical pressed wood furniture. I also bought the 6 drawer dresser and if it looks anything like the night stand.... I will be very happy!
customer_reviews.author: catherine james

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured. Very nice for "Do it Yourself" furniture. Very easy to assemble IF you read the directions carefully and LOOK at the pictures! It didn't take too long to put together. Arrived promptly and in perfect condition. Sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Regular Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken Unable to Salvage
customer_reviews.text: The nightstand was so flimsy that it broker during its assembly. Unfortunately, my son threw it away before it could be returned. This does not even rank a single star. this is a Do Not Purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Newman

customer_reviews.title: Color is much lighter than the photo....not even in the same ball park!
customer_reviews.text: The color isn't even close to the picture. Not only is the color not even close...neither is the model. I got a medium brown night stand with a drawer and a door! So...what I ordered was the Sauder Shoal Creek Night stand....what I got??? A Carson Forge Collection Side Table....Are you kidding me? And I'm supposed to return this box I can barely pick up? Who dropped the ball here people?????
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Ciraldo

customer_reviews.title: but they look great and work
customer_reviews.text: We bought two. For each side of the bed. Some difficulty assembling, but they look great and work well
customer_reviews.author: Lovin it

product_meta.title: Sauder Night Stand, Jamocha Wood Finish
product_meta.description:
Color:Jamocha Wood FinishAdd some style to your bedroom with this night stand from the Shoal Creek collection. It features one easy-to-access drawer that opens and closes on smooth metal runners, making it perfect for storing your favorite night time read, glasses, and remote. Find even more storage with the lower open shelf. Finished in a modish dark Jamocha Wood, this bedside table will take your room from drab to fab.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Shoal Creek night stand is a lovely addition to your nursery collection and completes the room, particularly when the crib is converted to a full size bed. Night stand includes drawer and open shelf for additional storage. Includes 1 drawer. Drawer has metal runners and safety stops and features patented T-lock assembly system. Constructed from medium density fiberboard and particle board with laminate. Accented with solid wood detailing. Quick and easy assembly. Instructions included. Carton Dimensions: 4 1/8" H x 18 1/8" L x 27 7/8" W, weight: 38 pounds. Setup Dimensions: 24" H x 17.5" L x 20 7/8" W, weight: 34 pounds. 5 year warranty for defects in materials. Rich, jamocha finish.
feature_bullets: Drawer with metal runners and safety stops features patented T-lock assembly system
Quick and easy assembly with patented slide-on molding
Optional Hidden Wireless Qi Compatible Charger by Eggtronics 425905 allows smartphone charging without all the fuss of cords or cables - purchase here
Manufactured for Child Craft by Sauder
5 year warranty against defects in materials
Drawers have metal runners and safety stops
